title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: But how the dog followed him is a mystery, andwhy he waited for him at the "Crooked Yett."

title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: But how the dog followed him is a mystery, andwhy he waited for him at the "Crooked Yett."

title: Murmurings from rugged waters.
author: Broomfield, James Polwarth. [from old catalog]
snippet: We were still in conversation with Rab when the herd o' the Yett and his dogs came plunging thro' the snow round by auld Rab's hen-house.

title: Murmurings from rugged waters.
author: Broomfield, James Polwarth. [from old catalog]
snippet: Next morning the clouds around the hill-head showed that a storm, and a bad one, was brewing, but the auld minstrel, although grandfaither urged him to stay, had to gang beyond the "Shepherd' s Yett;" and go he would — storm or no storm.
